Voici votre matrice initialisee :
   x1                     x2              x3              ╬╗
1 1.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 4.0000000000000000 50.0000000000000000
2 3.0000000000000000 5.0000000000000000 -4.0000000000000000 2.0000000000000000
3 4.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 -2.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

1e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              ╬╗
1 1.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 4.0000000000000000 50.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000000 -4.0000000000000000 -16.0000000000000000 -148.0000000000000000
3 4.0000000000000000 7.0000000000000000 -2.0000000000000000 31.0000000000000000

2e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              ╬╗
1 1.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 4.0000000000000000 50.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000000 -4.0000000000000000 -16.0000000000000000 -148.0000000000000000
3 0.0000000000000000 -5.0000000000000000 -18.0000000000000000 -169.0000000000000000

3e etape :
   x1                     x2              x3              ╬╗
1 1.0000000000000000 3.0000000000000000 4.0000000000000000 50.0000000000000000
2 0.0000000000000000 -4.0000000000000000 -16.0000000000000000 -148.0000000000000000
3 0.0000000000000000 0.0000000000000000 2.0000000000000000 16.0000000000000000

Les reponses sont:
x1 = 3.0000000000000000 x2 = 5.0000000000000000 x3 = 8.0000000000000000

Les mineurs principaux sont:
m1 = 1.0000000000000000 m2 = -4.0000000000000000        m3 = 2.0000000000000000
